This Shiny tab visualizes the distribution of primary crime types in Chicago. Users can select any year between 2001 to 2023 using a downdrop menu, and the app will display a bar chart showing the top ten crime types for the chosen year.   
Notably, “Battery” and “Theft” have consistently appeared among the most common crimes throughout the period. Starting in 2020, “Weapons Violations” emerged as a primary crime type, potentially reflecting changes in Illinois’s gun regulations.
